headline: Why ServiceNow Stock Lagged the Market on Monday
summary: Not for the first time in the past few trading days, ServiceNow (NYSE: NOW) stock received a price target cut from an analyst tracking the company.  The day's reduction came from Joel Fishbein of Truist Securities, who knocked $150 per share off his ServiceNow fair value assessment.  Fishbein's cut was part of a broader analysis on the infrastructure and security software segments of the tech industry.
